titles: Anglia rediviva being a full description of all the shires, cities, principal towns and rivers, in England : with some useful observations concerning what is most remarkable ... : to which is prefix'd a short account of the first origine of our nation, of its being conquer'd by the Romans, as also the occasion of the Saxons and Danes first entring England / collected from the best historians by Mr. Dunstar.
author: Dunstar, Mr. (Samuel), 1675-1754.
publisher: Printed for T. Bennet [and three others],
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Tables of cities, counties, and inhabitants: p. [2]-[9] at end.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Early works to 1800.
